# vapi Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    vapi = {
      source  = "kirillve/vapi"
      version = "0.10.0"
    }
  }
}

provider "vapi" {
  url   = "https://api.vapi.ai"
  token = "some-token"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `token` (String, Sensitive) The Bearer token used for API authentication.
- `url` (String) The base URL of the remote API.
